pkgmetadata.longdescription: Confidence Sets for Ranks // Construct confidence sets for positions of populations in a ranking based on values of a certain feature and their estimation errors. Both simultaneous and marginal confidence sets are available, as well as confidence sets with populations occupying top-n positions in the ranking. Theory based on Mogstad, Romano, Shaikh, and Wilhelm (2023)doi:10.1093/restud/rdad006.
